content:
Hi! I had a perf regression in my PR: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87349
I tried to make computations inside visible_parent_map lazy.
On my PC await-tree-call example is compiling now in 42-48ms in nightly and just
1-8ms more for stage1 version.

Can you please redo @rust-timer run and provide some guidance how to optimize this more?
